title: T206 Walsh El Principe for sale

posts.post_title: T206 Walsh El Principe for sale
posts.post_content:
T206 Ed Walsh with tough El Principe De Gales back-VG-$500.00. Also has a slight color shift. Please Visit my updated website [url]http://t206.monkberry.com[/url]. I'm offering 10% off all orders until November 1st. I pay postage on all orders over $200.

Please contact me by email at [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url] with questions or to place an order NO PMs, please.

[IMG]http://www.monkberry.com/~edhans/t206walsc.jpg[/IMG]

Edited to add that there are over 70 new T206s for sale.

posts.post_title: T206 Cy Young Sovereign for sale
